definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: Many teens find them readily available through local dealers or online.
sentences.chinese: 许多少年从当地药贩或网上购得。

sentences.english: Lime water may be bought at any druggist's, or easily prepared at home.
sentences.chinese: 石灰水可从药店购得，不过在家里配制也很容易。

sentences.english: For real pheromone, it is impossible to be obtained at so cheap price.
sentences.chinese: 真正高品质的费洛蒙，是不可能那么便宜可以购得的。

sentences.english: It was bought at Sotheby's by the Perot Foundation in 1993.
sentences.chinese: 在1993年通过苏士比拍卖行，由佩洛特基金购得。

sentences.english: They bought the freehold of their house.
sentences.chinese: 他们购得了一处可终身拥有的房子。

sentences.english: You can buy it from Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在亚马逊上购得。

sentences.english: But we climbers don't have the luxury of purchasing that competitive edge.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们攀岩者无法奢求购得这样的竞争优势。

sentences.english: It is actually easily affordable, with the ticket price ranging from over 1,000 yuan to merely 50 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 从上千元的贵宾票到50元的普通票，都可以购得。

sentences.english: Chinese investors aren’t allowed to purchase control of Taiwanese financial companies.
sentences.chinese: 中国的投资者并不允许购得台湾金融公司的控制权。

sentences.english: A person who buys something, especially something expensive.
sentences.chinese: 以最高应价购得拍卖标的竞买人。

sentences.english: I need not sell my soul to buy bliss.
sentences.chinese: 我不必出卖灵魂来购得幸福。

sentences.english: I consider it to be one of the best purchases I’ve made.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这是我所购得的东西中最值得一个之一。

sentences.english: However, if you should make us an acceptable bid, there is a possibility of your obtaining these.
sentences.chinese: 若你方能给一个可接受的递盘，有可能购得此货。

sentences.english: Half of them, he reckons, had been bought or pilfered from state armories .
sentences.chinese: 据他估计，其中有一半是从国家武器库购得或盗出。

definition: to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
to pass on/to resell/to change hands
to sell off/to get rid of in a sale
to order goods/to place an order
to give a present/to accord (a favor)/to grant
